text: "Worth Every Mile" is a song written and recorded by American country music artist Travis Tritt. It was released in October 1993 as the fifth single from the album T-R-O-U-B-L-E. The song reached #30 on the Billboard Hot Country Singles & Tracks chart. ==Chart performance== {|class="wikitable sortable" !align="left"|Chart (1993) !align="center"|Peak position |- |- |align="left"|Canadian RPM Country Tracks |align="center"|52 |} ==References== Category:1993 singles Category:1992 songs Category:Travis Tritt songs Category:Songs written by Travis Tritt Category:Warner Records singles
title: Worth Every Mile
